sourcesContent:
import React, { useState } from "react"; import { Trash2, ShoppingCart, CreditCard, ArrowLeft, CheckCircle, } from "lucide-react"; import { useNavigate } from "react-router-dom"; // ✅ Import this const Cart = () => { const navigate = useNavigate(); // ✅ Hook to navigate // Sample course data with INR pricing const [courses, setCourses] = useState([ { id: 1, title: "Complete React Developer Course", instructor: "Sarah Johnson", price: 7499, image: "https://images.unsplash.com/photo-1633356122544-f134324a6cee?w=150&h=100&fit=crop", duration: "40 hours", }, { id: 2, title: "Advanced JavaScript Mastery", instructor: "Mike Chen", price: 6699, image: "https://images.unsplash.com/photo-1627398242454-45a1465c2479?w=150&h=100&fit=crop", duration: "35 hours", }, { id: 3, title: "Bootstrap 5 Complete Guide", instructor: "Emma Rodriguez", price: 4199, originalPrice: 8299, image: "https://images.unsplash.com/photo-1555066931-4365d14bab8c?w=150&h=100&fit=crop", duration: "25 hours", }, ]); const [orderComplete, setOrderComplete] = useState(false); const subtotal = courses.reduce((sum, course) => sum + course.price, 0); const tax = subtotal * 0.18; const total = subtotal + tax; const removeCourse = (id) => { setCourses(courses.filter((course) => course.id !== id)); }; const handleProceedToCheckout = () => { const cartData = { courses, subtotal, tax, total }; sessionStorage.setItem("cartData", JSON.stringify(cartData)); navigate("/checkout"); // ✅ Using navigate instead of window.location.href }; const handleContinueShopping = () => { navigate("/courses"); // ✅ Redirect to Courses page }; if (orderComplete) { return (

Order Complete!

Thank you for your purchase! Your courses are now available in your learning dashboard. You should receive a confirmation email shortly.

); } return (
  1. Home
  2. Cart
  3. Checkout

Shopping Cart {courses.length}

{courses.length === 0 ? (

Your cart is empty

Explore our courses and add some to your cart to get started!

) : (
{courses.map((course) => (
{course.title}

by {course.instructor}

{course.duration}
₹{course.price.toLocaleString()}
))}
{/* ✅ Updated button with onClick to navigate to /courses */}
Order Summary
Subtotal: ₹{subtotal.toLocaleString()}
GST (18%): ₹{tax.toFixed(0).replace(/\B(?=(\d{3})+(?!\d))/g, ",")}
Total: ₹{total.toFixed(0).replace(/\B(?=(\d{3})+(?!\d))/g, ",")}
🔒 Secure checkout with 256-bit SSL encryption
)}
); }; export default Cart;
